title: The Quantum Café Incident

panel_structure.description: Threshold café where drinks exist in multiple states—Evan accidentally spills quantum coffee that's both hot and cold, there and not there
The Architect trying to calculate cleanup for a spill that keeps changing states, their usually perfect patterns going adorably haywire
Both laughing helplessly as the spill becomes a small probability storm, finding joy in the beautiful mess of uncertainty

transformation_notes: A simple coffee spill in the threshold café becomes a lesson in releasing control. The Architect learns that some messes are meant to be laughed at, not solved.
dialogue_rhythm: Panic to problem-solving to helpless laughter
